83b7(mdo sde): su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// des na rgyal po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur
83b8(mdo sde): ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ 
84a1(mdo sde): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen na ma/ dge bsnyen ma/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
84a2(mdo sde): bzung ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / zhi ba dang legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrungs dang / rgyal po chen po
84a3(mdo sde): 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga
84a4(mdo sde): la bde legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
84a5(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal
84a6(mdo sde): bo gang dang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig/ lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal
84a7(mdo sde): po bgyid cing rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
84a8(mdo sde): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang du bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun tu gser
84b1(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos gnyen pa'i chu bo'i chu/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'ongs bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi dang gnod sbyin 'bum
84b2(mdo sde): phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur// bdag
84b3(mdo sde): cag gi gzi byin dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas
84b4(mdo sde): pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lus ltar mi ganga' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dud sa na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ 
84b5(mdo sde): yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gsera'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po
84b6(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa
84b7(mdo sde): ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang yul
84b8(mdo sde): 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba
85a1(mdo sde): dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o// 
85a2(mdo sde): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / 
85a3(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan
85a4(mdo sde): lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yulade rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser
85a5(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po ga zhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul
85a6(mdo sde): du byin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang / nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag
85a7(mdo sde): kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla mngab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu
85a8(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla mad ba nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas
85b1(mdo sde): byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam
85b2(mdo sde): par gzhig par 'tshal bar 'gyur na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi
85b3(mdo sde): ganga' bar bgyid te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang
85b4(mdo sde): nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de de mchi bar yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid
85b5(mdo sde): ba lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhe sa bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so
85b6(mdo sde): legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs so// khyod bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par
85b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar
85b8(mdo sde): gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang
86a1(mdo sde): 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrungs shig/ yongs su bsgrub pa dang / yongs su
86a2(mdo sde): bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chang ba spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa
86a3(mdo sde): thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshegs rnams kyang zlog par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i rgyal po de dag mi 'thab pa
86a4(mdo sde): dang / 'chang mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed pa ra bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
86a5(mdo sde): nam grong khyer brgyad khro bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon pa/ ra dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug nges mngon
86a6(mdo sde): bar dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi skyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i
86a7(mdo sde): rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du g.yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir/ pha rol gyis mi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ 
86a8(mdo sde): grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ 
86b1(mdo sde): phan tshun du mi 'thab/ 'tshang mi 'bru/ mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis 'dzam bu/ 
86b2(mdo sde): gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang byin can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang / zla ba
86b3(mdo sde): byed dang / lo khyud 'khor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ 
86b4(mdo sde): char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'jam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rna/ rnams kyang / nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ 
86b5(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba/ dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi
86b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lce'i khang khyim rnams kyang lca dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag la la zhig mi'i rgyal por 'gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa
86b7(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di bang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin
86b8(mdo sde): pade dag la yang sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed / rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 
87a1(mdo sde): brje ba'i phyir dag par rgyun du/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu klung / chos bdung rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ khyed cag gi
87a2(mdo sde): lus ngag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang skyed do// khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / 
87a3(mdo sde): dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang
87a4(mdo sde): mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po nges 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye
87a5(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la yang yo byang bsam rgya/ sa mi khyab pa// rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// des na mo'i rgyal po chen po
87a6(mdo sde): de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs
87a7(mdo sde): su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas
87a8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i po
87b1(mdo sde): brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang / ches gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
87b2(mdo sde): dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra
87b3(mdo sde): med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshegs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
87b4(mdo sde): la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po da yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dag
87b5(mdo sde): gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'a/ ngas mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis gser 'od/ dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal
87b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgying 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi
87b7(mdo sde): tshogs rnams la'ang / bsrung ba chen po bgying 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i pho drang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
87b8(mdo sde): pa mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'chal
88a1(mdo sde): par gyur/ rgyal po nying bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yang yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/ 
88a2(mdo sde): bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi
88a3(mdo sde): dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzib dang / 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po nges g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i
88a4(mdo sde): sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pa da sa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'o// / sti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od
88a5(mdo sde): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi 'i rgyal po des/ rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang // 
88a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho drang spos chab sna tshogs chag chag btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der/ chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna
88a7(mdo sde): tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus
88a8(mdo sde): dkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu gda' ba/ gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gis stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyis te/ stan
88b1(mdo sde): de la mchis nas/ rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par
88b2(mdo sde): spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal
88b3(mdo sde): po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// 
88b4(mdo sde): btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal/ po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang
88b5(mdo sde): tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i phyir ma chong pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyod du stsal bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis
88b6(mdo sde): pas/ bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par
88b7(mdo sde): bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das/ 
88b8(mdo sde): kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po ngas gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa mgo bar bya'o// spud
89a1(mdo sde): pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// gdugs dkar po yang bzung bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal
89a2(mdo sde): po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba de bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos
89a3(mdo sde): der gom pa ji snyed bor ba/ de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gis 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
89a4(mdo sde): brag thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa de snyeng bor bde snyed du / tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyi mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
89a5(mdo sde): drag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha'i gzhal mo/ nga khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par/ 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs dang lnga'i rgya che ba 'bum
89a6(mdo sde): drag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tshe bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar
89a7(mdo sde): 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan
89a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar
89b1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge
89b2(mdo sde): ba'i bshes bsnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te// rgyal po chen po dgra yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong
89b3(mdo sde): nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 
89b4(mdo sde): yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// deng
89b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/ gas pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ bdag gi rgya/ la po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag
89b6(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis/ 
89b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// 
89b8(mdo sde): deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyu'o// 
90a1(mdo sde): deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// deng
90a2(mdo sde): bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba
90a3(mdo sde): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag
90a4(mdo sde): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis
90a5(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs
90a6(mdo sde): thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mchog du khyad par du 'phags
90a7(mdo sde): pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis yul 'di dag thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang pha rol gyi dmag
90a8(mdo sde): tshegs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge ba ste/ 
90b1(mdo sde): nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la/ mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ 
90b2(mdo sde): mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de
90b3(mdo sde): bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 
90b4(mdo sde): tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang / phun sum chog/ sa pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// 
90b5(mdo sde): phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang 'bru/ na par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen
90b6(mdo sde): po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la de chos la gus pa de lta bus/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
90b7(mdo sde): rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid// mchod
90b8(mdo sde): par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du/ rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag ngar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag
91a1(mdo sde): cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mongs du chos mnyan pa de dag nyan cing / bdag dang lnga thams cad kyi slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad gcig
91a2(mdo sde): sbyin par bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po des/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna
91a3(mdo sde): tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du/ bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu/ spos sna tshogs
91a4(mdo sde): las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag 'byung ba/ dar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang
91a5(mdo sde): ba'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi'akhril shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas para'agyur ro// spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ 
91a6(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang / bdug pa sna
91a7(mdo sde): tshegs kyi 'khril shing dag/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo
91a8(mdo sde): brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
91b1(mdo sde): lagan rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sdeng dpon chen po nor bu brdang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu ljang rgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po madros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgyum
91b2(mdo sde): dang / de dag gi rang rang gi khong pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyis khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang
91b3(mdo sde): mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba nges gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
91b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di ska da ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag/  rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi
91b5(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang la spros dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zang // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dang / mi'i
91b6(mdo sde): rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ lag na pog snod gcig thogs pa de las/ 
91b7(mdo sde): spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams
91b8(mdo sde): cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug dang / 
92a1(mdo sde): khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag brgya dang / 
92a2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med/ 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi bye ba/ phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
92a3(mdo sde): thams cad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad nas/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
92a4(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang bdag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs dkyi 'khril shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ 
92a5(mdo sde): spos kyi dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa
92a6(mdo sde): rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lnga'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang
92a7(mdo sde): bdug pa'i 'khril shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mo'i rgyal po des/ spos sna tshogs
92a8(mdo sde): de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyo mthus spos dang / 'dug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 
92b1(mdo sde): de dag skad cig thang cig/ yud tsam de la kun du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams
92b2(mdo sde): su/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gang+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril shing rnams su gnas par
92b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung
92b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba dakhrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po
92b5(mdo sde): dag/ cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu nge ba zhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ chos smra ba de la dgongs
92b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu zab mo'i don 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta
92b7(mdo sde): bu/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa/ khyod yang legs so legs so// zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// su
92b8(mdo sde): zan gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 
93a1(mdo sde): 'chang pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lnga spos kyang ci dgos te/ dotso byo zhe na/ skyes
93a2(mdo sde): bu dam pa gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
93a3(mdo sde): las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs po bye ba khrag
93a4(mdo sde): khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyan bzhugs pa dag gis/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshig 'thun pa dang / ngag 'thun pa dang / sgra skad 'thun pas
93a5(mdo sde): dge slong chos smra ba/ chos kyi khri stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
93a6(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems
93a7(mdo sde): can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ 
93a8(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po la legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par
93b1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu yigs khri ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna
93b2(mdo sde): tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med par rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang
93b3(mdo sde): bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod
93b4(mdo sde): pa mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis ra/ rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa brdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa
93b5(mdo sde): khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyesabu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa
93b6(mdo sde): 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi cher bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu
93b7(mdo sde): dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can
93b8(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu ngam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag
94a1(mdo sde): mnyes par 'gyur zhes gsung bar 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces
94a2(mdo sde): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mo'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs
94a3(mdo sde): rgyas 'bum phrag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas/ snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
94a4(mdo sde): cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchi/ das pa dag/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khril
94a5(mdo sde): shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu/ lus mi gang 'a bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa/ legs par phyag dar bgyis
94a6(mdo sde): pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyi chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi
94a7(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang
94a8(mdo sde): ngag shas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor/ 
94b1(mdo sde): bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis
94b2(mdo sde): te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan bde ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la
94b3(mdo sde): bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa/ gnod
94b4(mdo sde): sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad 'thun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa
94b5(mdo sde): chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos bdung rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung bar ba gyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung
94b6(mdo sde): ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid/ mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de yang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// 
94b7(mdo sde): yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang // zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid do// chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o// yul der yang
94b8(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nang 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal
95a1(mdo sde): de'i yul du/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po nga/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ 
95a2(mdo sde): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la/ sti stang du mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi
95a3(mdo sde): bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi
95a4(mdo sde): bgying / lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin yang rnam par/ 'phel bar mi bgyid do// bdag cag gi brtson 'a grus dang / mthu dang stobs kyang mi skyed/ bdag cag gi lus
95a5(mdo sde): la gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid pa lags so// bcu/ na pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
95a6(mdo sde): dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar
95a7(mdo sde): dor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshigs thams cad kyis kyang / yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ 
95a8(mdo sde): yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi b.rang ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab
95b1(mdo sde): bskye ba dang / 'tshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang nang rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas
95b2(mdo sde): skar mnga' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang / sgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par ganga' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i
95b3(mdo sde): gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang / rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil
95b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa 'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin pa grags par 'gyur/ yu/ la du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char pa drag po 'bab par
95b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i yang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pa rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur8/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs
95b6(mdo sde): pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi pung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma
95b7(mdo sde): dang yul na gnas pa'i lha dang klu rnams kyi yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom
95b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgying 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/ 
96a1(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad bstangs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ 
96a2(mdo sde): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul thams cad du yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rang
96a3(mdo sde): gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal
96a4(mdo sde): po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
96a5(mdo sde): bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yangasti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod pa bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang
96a6(mdo sde): g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi
96a7(mdo sde): gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam
96a8(mdo sde): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam
96b1(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam
96b2(mdo sde): ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag
96b3(mdo sde): pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag
96b4(mdo sde): de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phra dag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog/ 
96b5(mdo sde): ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ sa/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags so// ci nas kyang 'dzam du
96b6(mdo sde): gling thams cad na/ gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis rgyal po rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang gi yul kun tu
96b7(mdo sde): bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
96b8(mdo sde): rnams pa ma ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul de dag na nang 'go ba ma mchis shing / 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / tsa nas yul thams cad ches
97a1(mdo sde): kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis/ rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing / 
97a2(mdo sde): snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa
97a3(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag
97a4(mdo sde): gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang stobs dang /  mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag gi lus
97a5(mdo sde): la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu/ 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam bu gling thams cad du lo legs shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang mi/ 
97a6(mdo sde): mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas sems
97a7(mdo sde): can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrag 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che bdag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / ldan cig gnas
97a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ltan/ bcom ldan 'das
97b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag pas/ ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i/ 
97b2(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyi lha'i shes pa bas/ ches 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
97b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas/ ches 'phags pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis
97b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slang du/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
97b5(mdo sde): rgyal po 'di/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag pararab tu bshad do// mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang
97b6(mdo sde): dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
97b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dir nye bar bstan/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do// 
97b8(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des/ gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan bgyi/ gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus
98a1(mdo sde): par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir rgyal pos
98a2(mdo sde): bopo khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas/ gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun
98a3(mdo sde): du bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba rgya cher gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'od 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas
98a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug shig dang / de dag lha dang mi dadang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa
98a5(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge
98a6(mdo sde): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gro zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
98a7(mdo sde): po rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su/ 
98a8(mdo sde): bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te/ 'di skad
98b1(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyis pa'i gzungs mchis pa 'di/ sems can gang la la ngag 'dzin cing 'chang bar
98b2(mdo sde): mos pa de la bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de la bdag gis srung zhing bskyabs pas/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te/ bde bar gnas
98b3(mdo sde): par bgyi'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o// gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus bsrung ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di sngar brjod par
98b4(mdo sde): dgyi'o// na mo bai shrang na ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ra ra ra/ ku no/ ku no/ khu no khu no/ ru no ru no/ sa ba sa ba/ ka ra kar/ 
98b5(mdo sde): bi kA ram/ ma hA bi kA rAm/ ma hA kA la/ ma hA radz+dza/ rak+Sha rak+Sha tu mAn/ sarbas twA nan tsa swAhA// bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di srud pa dkar po la
98b6(mdo sde): sngags la na re bzlas shing bdud pa lan ri bor te// de ltar lan bdun byas nas/ dpung pa la btags na don de nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang na/ 
98b7(mdo sde): khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ spos gu gul dang / tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / du ru ka dang / a ga ru dang / spos kar po la sogs pa 'di dag cha mnyam par sbyar ba'i
98b8(mdo sde): spos kyis mchod cing sngags 'di bzlas pas/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o// na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA d+ha na dA ya/ tsan De shwa rA ya/ A kar Sha/ a ba ra dzita/ 
99a1(mdo sde): tsan Te shwa ra/ bar ma/ kA ru Ni ka/ sarba satwa/ hita tsin ta/ ma ma d+ha na bar d+ho/ bar+ye sha sA ya ma A ka ra sha ya swAhA// sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas
99a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'og tu/ rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// sngags 'di 'don pa'i dus su/ dkon mchog gsum dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o// rgyal po che
99a3(mdo sde): po rnam thos kyi bu ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhing nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas na/ sems
99a4(mdo sde): can de dag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas lho'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i sngags kyi
99a5(mdo sde): snying po 'di smras so// na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra baNA/ ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ su mu su/ mu/ tsan Da tsa na Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ 
99a6(mdo sde): ki li ki li/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ san dA ya/ Ad ma naM/ na tin/ an dar d+hA tu swA hA/ na me be shra ba NA ya swAhA/ d+ha na dA ya swA hA/ ma no ra tha pa ri pu rA ya swAhA/ 
99a7(mdo sde): sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ khang pa dben pa'i nang du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig byas te/ bshis ci 'byor par mchod par bya'o// spos dam pa bsregs
99a8(mdo sde): pa'i du ba'i rgyun mi chad par bya zhing / nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcig pas/ sngags kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas pa na/ de nas rgyal po chen po
99b1(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu'i sras/ dzi nar sha d+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis/ de'i gan du mchis te/ nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol zhes dri bar byed do// de nas bdag ni dkon
99b2(mdo sde): mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig gsol gyis stsol cig ces smos shig/ de nas sras dzi nar sha b+has yab la gsol ba/ skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon mchog
99b3(mdo sde): gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol ba dang / yab kyi khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa ni brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to// 
99b4(mdo sde): de nas sngags bsgrub pa des/ ltas de lta bu mthong na das don de grub par shes te/ gnas dben par bad dgacig pu spos bsregs la/ nyal khar sngas su dri'i za
99b5(mdo sde): me tog gcig bzhag ste nyal bar bya'o// de phyin cad na nga gcig bzhin du za ma tog de'i nang nas nor 'byung ba las/ nor de de'i nyin par dkon mchog gsum la
99b6(mdo sde): mchod pa'i yo byad me tog dang spos dang / zhal zas la sogs pa sbyar ba dang / brel cing phongs pa rnams la yang sbyin la yang zad par bya'o// sems can thams cad la
99b7(mdo sde): byams par bsam mo// khro ba dang 'tsho ba'i bsam pa bskyed na/ de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i sems mi skye bar rtog tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin
99b8(mdo sde): pades nyin cig bzhin du lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gzhan yang sras dang / sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la/ rtag par bsam zhing / bstod pa dang bsngags pa bya'o// 
100a1(mdo sde): rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhing lnga la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu dang / bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba
100a2(mdo sde): rgyas pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// lha de dag gis de ltar byed pa de mthong nas kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pas 'ong zhing de la bsrung ba dang / skyob par byed do// 
100a3(mdo sde): sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tshe lo dpag tu med par gnas shing / ngan song gsum yongs su spang ba dang / bgegs dang bar chad thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro// yid bzhin gyi nor bu
100a4(mdo sde): 'di dag dang / gter gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// // rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsam pa thams cad na kyang grub par 'gyur ro// gal te longs spyod can du 'dod na
100a5(mdo sde): yang yid bzhin du grub pa dang / bya dang gcan zan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro// bcom/ ldan 'das sngags bsgrub pa des bdag mthong bar 'tshal
100a6(mdo sde): na tshes brgyang ngam/ tshes bco lnga'i nyin par/ ras dkar po la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pi ta dang / sbyor ba'i tshen rtsis rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan gyis ba/ ri mo mkhan
100a7(mdo sde): gso sbyin gyi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
100a8(mdo sde): dubu'adag bu spang dang 'khor du bcas par bris te/ gnas der bkram nas/ me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / 
100b1(mdo sde): zhal zas dngar ba sna tshogs kyis/ nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par bya'o// sngags 'di bzlos pas sems mi g.yeng bar bya zhing / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
100b2(mdo sde): buspyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// na mo shwa kan thA ya/ bud d+hA ya/ na mo be shra baNA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ya/ ma hA dza ye/ a ti rA dzA ya/ na ma shrI ma hA hri
100b3(mdo sde): ye/ tad+ya thA/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su shud+d+ho su shud+d+ho/ ha na ha na/ ma ni ka ne/ badz+re de DUr+ya/ kuka ti ka/ a lang kr-ita/ sha ri rI ya/ sarba satwa/ 
100b4(mdo sde): hiha kA ma/ be shra ba NA/ shrI ya de bI pra b+ha ya/ a hi a hi/ mA bi lam b+ha/ g+hurna g+hur+Na/ pa ra s+ya/ pa ra s+ya/ dngi hi ma ma/ dar shan/ kA ma s+ya dar sha
100b5(mdo sde): nam ma ma/ ma na pra la da ya swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ bdag byams pa
100b6(mdo sde): dang / dga' ba'i bsam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs sam/ yang na rgam po 'am/ dge slong gi gzugs su byas te/ bdag lag na yid
100b7(mdo sde): bzhin gyi nor bu gser gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ lus kyi gus pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de/ 
100b8(mdo sde): sngags mkhan nga la 'di skad ces smra'o// khyod ni ci dang ci spong ba de dag thams cad grub par bya ste/ nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod pa'am/ mi mang po'i yid du 'ong ba
101a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa'am/ gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa 'am/ sngags gzhan nub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes
101a2(mdo sde): ba dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / sman bcud kyis len 'dod ba la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du grub par bya'o// bdag gis dngos po de dag la sogs pa mdo tsam
101a3(mdo sde): zhig smos par zad kyis de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod na yang thams cad bsam pa bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste/ rin po che yi gter mo bzad pa dang / bsod nams
101a4(mdo sde): tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dper na nyi zla 'dis laltung bar 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srid kyi/ dben pa'i tshig
101a5(mdo sde): 'din nams kyang slu bar mi 'gyur bas/ rtag tu bde ba dang / yi bzhin du skyid pa longs spyod pa thob par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i rgyal po
101a6(mdo sde): 'di gang zhig 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing 'don pa yang rung / sngags 'di grub pa yang rung ste/ tshogs chung ngus/ myur du grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag
101a7(mdo sde): gis sems can dbul zhing phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di bshad pas/ des phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa tshe cig tu 'byor par
101a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bdag gis kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang zhing gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo
101b1(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal pod 'dzin cing rgyas par byed du dang sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag dgom pa brgya tshun chang 'od kyi snang bar byas te/ bdag go 'khor gnod sbyin stong
101b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang / rtag tu de'i g.yog tu bsgo zhing mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug go// bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di srub med par yang / bcom ldan 'das
101b3(mdo sde): kyis dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus sngags de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to// 
101b4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad drang bas/ phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di smras
101b5(mdo sde): ba dang / gzhan yang mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi
101b6(mdo sde): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ zhabs gnyis la
101b7(mdo sde): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba
101b8(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'ong / rgyal ba 'ad+ma dri ma meng ba'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog bang rtsa rdul med tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bus
102a1(mdo sde): rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang // ting 'dzin brgya drug stong gis kun du gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor
102a2(mdo sde): los bris 'dra ste// 'khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba dang pa'i dbang po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'/ 
102a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal// yon tan thams cad ri dbang 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla nga chu zla 'dra// nam mkha' dang
102a4(mdo sde): yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma mig sgyu lta bur chags med pa// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs
102a5(mdo sde): su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gis gser 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson
102a6(mdo sde): 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa// sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu'i
102a7(mdo sde): gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang // sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni// 
102a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin// 'dzam gling 'di na 'jam gling gnas pa yi// rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos
102b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyangs par gyis// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bde ba dang / shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dga' 'gyur zhing // 'dzam bu'i gling ni
102b2(mdo sde): thams cad dag na yang // sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis// 'di ni ma yi dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa
102b3(mdo sde): dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// mdo sde'i dbang 'di mchog tu dge bar byed// pha rol dag ni yang dag zad par byed// pha rol dmag tshogs zlog byed dge ba byed/ 
102b4(mdo sde): mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel bar byed// dper dan rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan ku ngan 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan
102b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchoga'adi de ltar blta// dper na chu grang skom pa selabyed pa// tsha bas nyams thag che ni snyed pa ltar/ 
102b6(mdo sde): yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// dper na rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa
102b7(mdo sde): ltar/ mi'i dbang po'i tshigs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha'i tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang
102b8(mdo sde): phyag byas pas// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang
103a1(mdo sde): po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs shes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag
103a2(mdo sde): brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang bsrung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na
103a3(mdo sde): gnas par gyur pa yi// lha'i tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// chos rnams
103a4(mdo sde): mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi byin chen po yis ni lha da yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'brel bar
103a5(mdo sde): 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis// bcom ldan 'a ngas la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur dga'
103a6(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig ngus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam
103a7(mdo sde): gyis mi khyad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man nga rab dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang stan
103a8(mdo sde): rnams las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo
103b1(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ri re la gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / chos sba
103b2(mdo sde): bde la bsrung ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slang bzhin 'drang bar bgyi'o// gal te mdo sde 'di las tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur
103b3(mdo sde): na yang / bdag cag gis de la dran pa dang / mi brjed pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyis rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dag gang na bzhugs
103b4(mdo sde): pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yongs su rgyas par byed pas/ nams kyang nub par mi 'gyur/  ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus
103b5(mdo sde): pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag gis ye shes dang spobs pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas/ 
103b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing 'khor ba yongs su spangs te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa myur du thob par
103b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'khor yongs su skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 
103b8(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
104a1(mdo sde): grangs 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi mdang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / 
104a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'dzin pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
104a3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs
104a4(mdo sde): kyi tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol/ pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i
104a5(mdo sde): bu ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod gzus
104a6(mdo sde): ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas shing / chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang
104a7(mdo sde): ma yin/ dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa can yang ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba yang ma yin/ rkyen med pa las byung ba yang ma yin// 'gro ba las
104a8(mdo sde): byung ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ chos gang gi skye ba yang ma yin/ 'gog pa yang ma yin par chos ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'
104b1(mdo sde): rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sa sa rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / 
104b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi rigs pa dang / stobs kyi gnas ston pa legs so legs so// 
104b3(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas gang la gnas
104b4(mdo sde): na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogadas pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / ya dang dag par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang / rten med pa'i
104b5(mdo sde): chos kyi rang bzhin gyi spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang / lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa
104b6(mdo sde): bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// sha
104b7(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyid du brjod par bya ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
104b8(mdo sde): la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchong bar byed pa des/ sangs rgyas la bkur bstir byas par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la la
105a1(mdo sde): gzungs 'di nyan par byed pa dang / gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa dang / gang dag mos par byed pas de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang bral bas/ 
105a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs de ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ san d+ha ra ni/ ud d+ha ra ni/ su sa ma pra tiSh+Thi ti/ su na ma/ su pra tiSh+Thi te/ 
105a3(mdo sde): bi dzA ya ba lA/ sang t+ya pra ti dzA/ su a ro hA/ dz+nyA na pra ti/ ud pAd naM/ a ba nA ba ni/ a b+hiShI ni/ a b+hi bya hA ra/ shu b+ha ba sti/ su ni shri tA/ ba hu gum b+ha/ a b+hi ba dA
105a4(mdo sde): swA hA/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i ga zungs kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang / legs par gzung ba byas nas 'chang
105a5(mdo sde): bar byed pa de bskal pa'am/ bskal pa bas lhag/ pa 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam bskal pa brgya phrag stong / du yang smon lam zad par mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la
105a6(mdo sde): mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma yin zhing sbrul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das
105a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yum da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes
105a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang
105b1(mdo sde): ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yon du/ phul zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams la bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang / zhal zas gya nom pas
105b2(mdo sde): bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gis chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la tshig cig tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du
105b3(mdo sde): bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum
105b4(mdo sde): yin no// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po da'i rgyal po las chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i da le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas
105b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glo ga thams cad bzlog pa so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi yang / 
105b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho
105b7(mdo sde): phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog
105b8(mdo sde): yod do// kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la/ glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung bar shes
106a1(mdo sde): par bya'o// glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger dris te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu/ glog thams cad mi 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan
106a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe/ drA di ra'i sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni mi/ ni min d+ha ri/ 'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs
106a3(mdo sde): 'dir glog thams cad bdag la srungs shig/ srungs shig/ swA hA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor
106a4(mdo sde): de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom lnga na 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ 
106a5(mdo sde): drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ka Te be ka Te/ ni ka Te/ pra t+yan+thi ke/ pra t+ya me tre/ shud d+he/ mug te/ bi ma le/ pra b+hA sA ra/ 
106a6(mdo sde): an Da re/ ban Da re/ shwe te/ pan Da re/ bA si ni/ ha ri kan Da ri/ ka paM li/ ping ga la/ a k+Shing dI mu khi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig
106a7(mdo sde): srungs shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/ bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i
106a8(mdo sde): bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
106b1(mdo sde): sa ga gis kya chos kyi rnam mas 'di la gzungs kyi tsog rnams parjod par 'gyu'o// 6/ rgyun tshun/ n+nat+tere/ ma timatI/ snum te/ swAHsarba/ 1
106b2(mdo sde): khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis dra di ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di/ su'i snying la
106b3(mdo sde): 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris pa de bdag gis rtag par rgyun tu/ 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar par bgyi'o// 
106b4(mdo sde): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda na 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams
106b5(mdo sde): kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ gzungs kyi gas ngasngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ 
106b6(mdo sde): hi li mi li/ tsi li swAhA/ brah+ma bu re swA hA/ brah+ma swa re swAhA/ brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/ pu shA sa sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi bsrung ba tshangs pa'i chang ba zhes
106b7(mdo sde): ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom
106b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
107a1(mdo sde): la/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// dang thA/ bon par ni/ ban d+ha/ mngan De/ ma ni ne ti/ ti na~M gaur
107a2(mdo sde): gan d+ha ri/  Ta li/ matang ma~M/ puk+ka sa~M/ sa la praSh+Te/ nam t+yo ma/ yud ShAr ni/ mthor ni/ d+ha dzig/ tsakra ba kre/ sha ba sha bar swAhA/ btsun pa bcom
107a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ni/ bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad
107a4(mdo sde): las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / 'phags skyes da po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam
107a5(mdo sde): thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
107a6(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag gis kyang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi grwasang sngags
107a7(mdo sde): kyi tshig 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ push+le su po shwe/ du ma ba ri hA re/ Ar+ya pu sha ste/ shAn ti ni mug te mang ga l+ya/ hi rat+na gar+b+he s+yA ste/ sta bi ta swA hA/ 
107a8(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi bsrungs pa 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa
107b1(mdo sde): tshe skyong ba dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyong pa lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / 
107b2(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
107b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams
107b4(mdo sde): mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byang ste/ dam dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa'i 'jig sa pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das
107b5(mdo sde): bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang ser sna spang ba'i slad du/ thugs brtse bar dgongasate bzhes su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom
107b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni ser sna can te/ sems sor snas bskor ba lags so// tad+ya thA/ a tsa le/ a me laM/ a mra te/ a ka ye/ a b+hi ye pu N+ye/ bat+yab te/ 
107b7(mdo sde): sarba pA paM/ pra shA ma ni ye swAhA/ ar+ya ba na du su bar ni ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes pa'am/ bud med gang la
107b8(mdo sde): la lce la 'don dam/ yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bya'o// rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ 
108a1(mdo sde): gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa
108a2(mdo sde): thams cad las bde bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste
108a3(mdo sde): bzhin bzangs dag/ khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bang ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ drA de Da'i gsang sngags
108a4(mdo sde): kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs so legs so// phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab ra tu myos pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
108a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rte/ na skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i bdag po de dag dang / lha
108a6(mdo sde): dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
108a7(mdo sde): rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis/ bla gros phrag pa gcig tu bgos
108a8(mdo sde): te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
108b1(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slang du/ spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang
108b2(mdo sde): stsal bar bgyinges pa'i cho ga gis brjod pa kun tu bzhag par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
108b3(mdo sde): po 'di las tshig 'ga' 'am/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag gcig yongs su nyams par gyur tam bskyud na/ bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig
108b4(mdo sde): dang yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag lang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ 
108b5(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sem/ sa can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
108b6(mdo sde): rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa
108b7(mdo sde): rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabs sna tshogs rab tu
108b8(mdo sde): 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyung ba
109a1(mdo sde): ma mchis par bgyi ba'i srang du/ de la gsungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gdon gyi slang du/ sngags
109a2(mdo sde): dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug glong dang / khrag drug
109a3(mdo sde): dang / rmilam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byang dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang phyug
109a4(mdo sde): ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag g+hi'u wang s+thi ka dang / sha myA mi shi ri sha/ in dra hasta skal pa che/ dzam shing tsa a ka ru/ shi ri be sta swa rtsi'i 'og/ gu ku la ras
109a5(mdo sde): shal ki/ rdo drag lo margya spos dang / tsan dan dang ni ljo / sa dang // g+hi ru wang dang bcas ru ta dang // gur du ma gla sgang yungs kar dang / spyi mo sug smel na la dang / 
109a6(mdo sde): nag gesar u shir// 'dingag tshan mnyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi// phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di// lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ su rba
109a7(mdo sde): te/ ka ma ta la~M/ na li dzin kar te/ hang kar te/ in drA dza li ni/ shaM kA ra dre/ ba shad d+he/ a btaka/ si ken ku tra ku/ ka be le/ ka be la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ san d+hi/ d+huH
109a8(mdo sde): ma ba ti/ shi shi ri/ sad t+ya s+thi te sA hA// lcibs dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni// me tog sil ma bkram par bgyi// gser gyi snod dang dngul sdong du// mngar ba'i lung gnag/ 
109b1(mdo sde): par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig der yang gzhag par bgyi// rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thogs pa gzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi// 
109b2(mdo sde): sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis// lha mo de ni legs par brgyan// bar bar dag tu me long bzhag/ mnga' dang mdung rtsi snga sbrang bzhag
109b3(mdo sde): de nas mtshams kyang bcang bar gyi// de'i 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gi/ mtshams spyad pa yang brtsam par bgyi// s+yad ya the dan/ a ra ka/ na
109b4(mdo sde): ya ne/ hi le/ mi le/ ki le/ khi khi/ le swAhA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su khrus bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ khrus
109b5(mdo sde): kyis zhi bar sbyar ro// tadad+ya thA/ sa ga re/ bi ga gai bi ga tab/ ti swA hA// phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i// rgyu skar dag gis tshe srungs shig/ btsas pa'i skar
109b6(mdo sde): ma'i gnod pa dang / phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung po khams rnams 'khrugs 'gyid pa// 'jigs pa mo bzang zhi gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha me bi Sha/ me swA hA/ 
109b7(mdo sde): sa ga De/ bi ga De sAhAh+ma/ bi ga De ba te swA hA/ sA ga ra/ sam bud d+hA ya sAhA/ skan d+ha mA tA ya sAh+ma/ nI la kanaShA ya sA hA/ a pa ra dza ta/ bir+yA ya sA hAM/ hI ma ban d+ha/ sam bud/ 
109b8(mdo sde): d+ha ya swA hA/ a ni mi la bag tra ye swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bra h+ma naM/ na ma swa ra sA t+ye/ ma hA de baM sing d+h+yan tu mAM/ man tra ba tra ta ra tu bi tsi taM/ prah+ma nu ma nu t+ya swA hA/ 
110a1(mdo sde): dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger bris pa de dag gi don gyi slang du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchi bar
110a2(mdo sde): bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ci nas dge slong ngam/ 
110a3(mdo sde): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang
110a4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang de dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
110a5(mdo sde): ba dang / gza' dang 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / bcas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan ba dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / 
110a6(mdo sde): byang dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod // skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo
110a7(mdo sde): mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te khyod kyis sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen mo
110a8(mdo sde): dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di nus lha mo dbyangs can de bku'o// 
110b1(mdo sde): lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che/ 'jig rten kun tu rnam grags mchog sbyin yon tan che// rtser gnas mdzes ma dur brtsa yis gos bskus pa/ 
110b2(mdo sde): ngur ba'i rtsa'i gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas// lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la dge ba'i cho ga shong lce khrol mdzod// sbyang
110b3(mdo sde): ya the na/ mu re/ tsi re/ a ba dze/ a ba dza ba ti/ hing gu le/ ming gu le/ bing ga la ba ti/ ming gu She/ ma ri n+ye/ sa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ a gri ta ma gri/ tar tsi/ 
110b4(mdo sde): tar tsa ba ti/ tsi r-i tsi ri/ shi ri mi ri/ ma ri n+ye/ pra na pri ye / lo ka dze sh+le/ lo ka shre sh+le/ lo ka pr-i da ye/ sid d+hi pra ba te/ b+hI ma mu khi/ shu tsi tsa ri la
110b5(mdo sde): a pra ti ha ta bud d+hi/ na mu tsi/ ma hA kan mu tsi/ ma hA bi/ pra ti gr-i hA/ na ma skA rA na/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig/ bstan bcos dang / 
110b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyu dang sde snod dang / snyan ngag la sogs pa la bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+hA ba/ hi li hi li/
